I enjoy creating dashboards on topics that interest me. Most of them are hosted on my Tableau Public site, but you can find them below as well. Sometimes you'll find me putting them out on Twitter.

<br>

### COVID-19 Dashboard
This dashboard uses data from the [New York Times](https://github.com/nytimes/covid-19-data) and [The COVID Tracking Project](https://covidtracking.com/) to display trends in COVID-19 cases, deaths, hospitalizations and tests. Click [here](covid_dashboard.html) to view the dashboard. <img src="covid_pic.png" width="250" height="300" id="hp"/>s


### 2020 Election: Presidential Polling Averages
This dashboard uses data from [538](https://github.com/fivethirtyeight/data/tree/master/polls) to compare presidential polling averages at similar points in the 2016 and 2020 presidential elections. Click [here](polling_dashboard.html) to view the dashboard.
